mapper.select: SELECT i.*,h.owner_name as `houseOwner.ownerName`,t.pay_type_name as `payInfo.payType.payTypeName`, pi.pay_info_money as `payInfo.payInfoMoney`,pi.pay_info_start_time as `payInfo.payInfoStartTime`, pi.pay_info_end_time as `payInfo.payInfoEndTime`, m.method_name as `payMethod.methodName` FROM pay_info_details i LEFT JOIN house_owner h ON h.owner_id=i.owner_id LEFT JOIN pay_method m ON m.method_id=i.method_id LEFT JOIN pay_info pi ON pi.pay_info_id=i.pay_info_id LEFT JOIN pay_type t ON t.pay_type_id=pi.pay_type_id WHERE h.owner_id=#{ownerId} order by i.pay_state,i.pay_info_id
SELECT * FROM pay_method WHERE method_name!='现金'
